meanings.definition: A person who stares inquisitively or with curiosity.
meanings.sent1: The rubberneck watched the parade with wide eyes.
meanings.sent2: The curious rubberneck peeked over the fence to see what was happening.
meanings.sent3: The little rubberneck was so interested in the magic show that he forgot to blink.
meanings.sent4: She was a rubberneck when it came to art, always eager to learn and observe.
meanings.sent5: The rubberneck's eyes were like magnets, drawn to anything new or unusual.

meanings.definition: To turn one's head to stare at something.
meanings.sent1: Don't rubberneck while driving, it's dangerous!
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but rubberneck at the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent3: He rubbernecked so much at the zoo that he almost tripped over a rock.
meanings.sent4: The cat rubbernecked at the bird flying by the window.
meanings.sent5: Rubbernecking at the celebrity, she accidentally bumped into a pole.

meanings.definition: A traffic jam caused by drivers slowing down to look at an accident.
meanings.sent1: The rubberneck caused a long line of cars on the highway.
meanings.sent2: The traffic was at a standstill due to a rubberneck up ahead.
meanings.sent3: The rubberneck made everyone late for work, but they couldn't resist looking.
meanings.sent4: The rubberneck was frustrating for those trying to get home quickly.
meanings.sent5: The rubberneck was like a slow-motion movie, with cars inching along the road.
